extendedInfo.description: A beautiful and fun puzzle game with over 60 levels set in a kingdom above the clouds.Kings Can Fly will soon have your brain sweating as you try to fly the King through his maze-like kingdom. You need a good eye and sharp wits to navigate the towering mountains, spiked gates and dangerous whirlwinds you encounter on the way.Features:* 60+ challenging puzzles* Cute and colorful 3D graphics* Adorable airships* Dangerous spikes* Whirlwinds* Original soundtrack* Easy to use hint systemXPERIA PLAY OptimizedThis game requests permissions for the following usage:Keeping your phone from sleeping to prevent the screen going blank while playing.Internet access for analytics and improved error reporting (we don't collect private data).Reading phone state to pause the game when you're being called.

reviews.title: Great Puzzler
reviews.comment: Very easy to learn, but difficult to win. Puzzles will definitely strain your brain! I can\'t wait for more levels, and hopefully another game like it!
reviews.author: Doug Reynolds

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This game is super high quality. Graphics are nice and the music is refreshing. Great job. Pretty fun
reviews.author: Vong Phonsiri

reviews.title: Thats fun!!
reviews.comment: Normally I do not care much for puzzle games, but this one is really good. Not to difficult in the beginning but challenging in the end. Graphics are cute and gameplay smooth. Runs without a hitch. A steal for this price.
reviews.author: Guido Bertling

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This game is very fun and challenging. I can see that a lot of initiative went into this game. Great job. The only problems I have found is that it drains my battery relatively quickly and gets my phone pretty hot. Weird for such a slow paced game like this. Still worth 5 stars though.
reviews.author: Garrett Zerner

reviews.title: Cute, simple and fun.
reviews.comment: Great graphics, simple to play.  A good time waster.  Would love the option to turn off the music but leave the sound effects on.
reviews.author: Rob A

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: Amazing style, and the later puzzles are challenging. Approved! :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome puzzle game
reviews.comment: Love the amount of detail in this game, oh and the puzzles are awesome. Well worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: :D
reviews.comment: Simple at first, brain-hurting later on. Fun game :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It be awesome
reviews.comment: Cute graphical style and yet a very challenging puzzler with the right skill curve, just how I like them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It\'s worth a buck!!!!! I suggest you get!!! it\'s a must!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Tim Aiken
